subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: In 2008, Da’Tara, ridden by Alan Garcia, pulled off a huge upset at the Belmont Stakes, preventing Big Brown and jockey Kent Desormeaux from winning the Triple Crown.
snippet: In 2008, Da’Tara, ridden by Alan Garcia, pulled off a huge upset at the Belmont Stakes, preventing Big Brown and jockey Kent Desormeaux from winning the Triple Crown.
